attributes.action: Stop any new EU Referendum from being allowed.
attributes.additional_details:
The people of this country have spoken to 52% for leave and 48% to remain.
In the last general election 2015 the Conservatives tables only 30%of the vote, yet the losing parties did not try and get a peptition going to pressure the Goverment to hold a new election, because I believe it would have raised millions of signatures. However we are British and have all ways accepted election results.
attributes.background:
A democratic referendum was held on 23rd June 2016 and the people have voted overwhelmingly to LEAVE.
A petition has been raised to have another referendum.
If this is allowed to go ahead it makes a mockery of people's rights.
It will demonstrate we don't have a democratic government.
